actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airways Development Act of 1970 in order to make American Samoa and the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands eligible for certain assistance under such Act.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Makes American Samoa and the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands eligible for assistance under the Airport and Airways Development Act of 1970.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airways Development Act of 1970 in order to make American Samoa and the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands eligible for certain assistance under such Act.
